content.rendered:
LEARNING OUTCOMES

  • Anatomy & Physiology
  • Medical Terminology. Pre-fix, Suffix, Abbreviations
  •  All human systems
  • ICD-9 CM
  •  CORING & Introduction to medical coding
  • WELL TESTING
  • Structure & conventions
  • General Coding guidelines
  •  Chapter specific guideline
  • CPT-4: Procedure CodingNG
  • Evaluation and Management Coding
  • Anesthesia Coding
  • WORK OVER  Surgery Coding
  • Radiology Coding
  • Pathology Coding WEEK HSE
  • Medicine Coding
  • HCPCS Coding

  • Evaluation and Management Coding
  • Anesthesia Coding
